programme.title: CYC TV
programme.desc: Christian Youth Channel - CYC aka Coptic Youth Channel, is a television and internet based English Coptic Orthodox Channel. CYC is the first English Coptic Christian channel, dedicated to Christians all around the world to spread the teachings and love of Jesus Christ. CYC looks to spread the word and life of Christ all through the world in a way that is compatible with today’s media consumption methods.

programme.title: CTV
programme.desc: CTV is the official channel of the Coptic Orthodox Church, run under the care and blessings of our Supreme Pontiff, His Holiness Pope Shenouda III, Pope of Alexandria and Patriarch of the See of St. Mark, may the Lord prolong his life for many years and healthy, safe eras.The channel presents all manner of art and television programs which reflect the original proper Orthodox faith and the Church's message, founded on love and peace within a framework of professional international media, which occasioned its enormous success. قناة سي تي في هي القناة الرسمية للكنيسة القبطية الأرثوذكسية، تحت رعاية قداسة البابا المعظم الأنبا تواضروس الثاني، بابا الإسكندرية وبطريرك الكرازة المرقسية، أدام الله رئاسته لنا سنينًا عديدة وأزمنة سلامية هادئة مديدة. وتقوم القناة بتقديم كافة أنواع الفنون والبرامج التليفزيونية التي تعكس أصالة وجوهر وسلامة العقيدة الأرثوذكسية ورسالة الكنيسة القائمة على المحبة والسلام في إطار من الحرفية الإعلامية.

programme.title: MESat TV
programme.desc: ME Sat TV, is a Christian Orthodox channel; aims to serve Christians worldwide through the broadcast of spiritual, social and health-related programmes. قناة مى سات، القناة الرسمية للكنيسة القبطية الأرثوذكسية تنوع برامج القناة بين تعليم الألحان القبطية، ودراسة الكتاب المقدس، عرض مسرحيات وأفلام دينية وبث مباشر للقداسات.

programme.title: Logos TV
programme.desc: Logos TV is a Christian Orthodox channel; its message is testimony to our good Lord Jesus Christ according to our Orthodox faith. The channels efforts revolve around four axes: Evangelism, education, healing, and defending the oppressed and persecuted. قناة لوجوس قـــناة الكنيسة القــبطية الأرثـــوذكسية الأولـــى بالمهجـــر، تحت الإشراف المباشر للكنيسة القبطية الأرثوذكسية... قناة لوجوس هي قناة مسيحية أرثوذكسية رسالتها الشهادة لإلهنا الصالح الرب يسوع المسيح حسب الإيمان الأرثوذكسي..

The channels efforts revolve around four axes: Evangelism, education, healing, and defending the oppressed and persecuted. قناة لوجوس قـــناة الكنيسة القــبطية الأرثـــوذكسية الأولـــى بالمهجـــر، تحت الإشراف المباشر للكنيسة القبطية الأرثوذكسية... قناة لوجوس هي قناة مسيحية أرثوذكسية رسالتها الشهادة لإلهنا الصالح الرب يسوع المسيح حسب الإيمان الأرثوذكسي..

programme.title: El Maqar TV
programme.desc: El Maqar TV - A Coptic TV Channel under the see of H.H. Pope Tawadros II and his partner in the service H.G. Bishop David Live Broadcast from NJ USA. شبكه قنوات المقر البابوي هي مجموعه قنوات خاصه وتابعه للمقر البابوي بنيوجيرسى تتنوع برامج القناة بين تعليم الألحان القبطية، ودراسة الكتاب المقدس، عرض مسرحيات وأفلام دينية وبث مباشر للقداسات.

Bishop David Live Broadcast from NJ USA. شبكه قنوات المقر البابوي هي مجموعه قنوات خاصه وتابعه للمقر البابوي بنيوجيرسى تتنوع برامج القناة بين تعليم الألحان القبطية، ودراسة الكتاب المقدس، عرض مسرحيات وأفلام دينية وبث مباشر للقداسات.

programme.desc: A distinctively emotional round of mood-enhancing songs. حناجر ذهبية تؤدي أجمل الأغنيات التي تناسب كل الأذواق والأمزجة.

programme.title: Free-TV
programme.desc: Arabic hits that simply strike the right note for a fulfilling musical experience. أشهر الأغاني العربية المصورة التي تناسب جميع الأذواق وتلعب على أوتار القلب فتارة يذوب حناناً ورقة، وطوراً تتسارع دقاته مع الإيقاع فيفيض حيوية وبهجة.

programme.title: Free-TV
programme.desc: Free TV is the Number One Music channel in Lebanon. In addition to airing the largest number of latest hits and exclusive music videos, Free TV also produces different entertainment shows all of which are directly related to music and celebrities. قناة فري تي-في هي الوجهة الأولى للموسيقى في لبنان، وبالإضافة إلى بث أكبر عدد من أنجح الأغاني الحديثة، تقوم القناة بإنتاج العديد من البرامج الترفيهية المرتبطة مباشرة بالموسيقى ومشاهير عالم الفن.

programme.desc: Revealing the truth behind incredible myths surrounding the animal kingdom. Discover whether or not a spider's silk is stronger than steel.

programme.title: Fish or Die
programme.desc: Lake Windsor on Inagua Island is home to a mystery. How did giant ocean-dwelling fish get into a lake with no natural inlet or outlet? The Fish or Die team journeys to the tropics to investigate the mystery and hopefully catch some world-class bonefish.

programme.title: Fish or Die
programme.desc: The team follows a lead to an extremely remote river in Greenland, believed to hold massive Arctic char. With its barren tundra, towering fjords, and ice-carved valleys, they discover Greenland is wilderness at its most pure and most dangerous.

programme.title: Fish or Die
programme.desc: Off the extreme eastern tip of Papua New Guinea lies Milne Bay. It's rumored to be home to huge schools of one of the greatest sportfish ever, the giant trevally. Trying to hook and land a giant trevally on a fly rod will be the ultimate test.

programme.title: Fish or Die
programme.desc: The crew travels to Mongolia in search of taimen: the largest, most ferocious member of the salmon family. Reaching their target will involve a punishing combination of back-breaking mountain trails, treacherous rivers and uncooperative Mongolian horses.

programme.title: Fish or Die
programme.desc: The Arapaima is the largest scaled freshwater fish in the world and considered the ultimate jungle catch. The crew heads to one of the most remote and inhospitable jungles of Ecuador to try and land one of these living dinosaurs.

programme.title: Fish or Die
programme.desc: The guys head deep into Zambia, chasing reports of large tigerfish - a fierce freshwater predator - in an uncharted river. The only thing standing in their way is 400 miles of unpaved roads, crocodiles, hippos and a serious lack of fuel.

programme.title: Fish or Die
programme.desc: Four friends begin a challenging jungle expedition in search of a giant golden dorado, possibly dwelling within a remote Bolivian river. To find their way there, they must conquer torrential rains, vicious insects and isolated tribes.

programme.title: Homestead Rescue
programme.desc: Poisoned well water and a mystery predator plague an Arizona homestead. After the family dog is killed, the Raney's must act quick to stop the couple from becoming the next victims.

programme.title: Homestead Rescue
programme.desc: An isolated road becomes a death trap when a medical emergency strikes a secluded homestead. The Raneys face their first ever failed rescue.

programme.title: Homestead Rescue
programme.desc: The Raneys must save two Hawaiian homesteaders who built their dream homestead in the path of life-threatening flash floods. As the weather closes in, the Raneys must battle to save a homestead from drowning and also win the trust of the homesteaders.

programme.title: Homestead Rescue
programme.desc: Fire is a constant threat for this Oregon homestead. Livestock should be meat, but here they are family pets. The Raneys must teach a hungry family to working together before it’s too late.

programme.title: Homestead Rescue: Survival Shelter
programme.desc: In the path of raging California wildfires, Marty and Matt devise a plan to create an evacuation route for their livestock and protect their home. Later, Marty takes on a risky build to prevent a Wisconsin homestead from going under.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Abandoned
programme.desc: In forgotten locations across the world, animals have become the rulers of humankind's ruins. Discover how Civil War ruins became a haven for alligators and polar bears infiltrated Arctic ghost towns.

programme.title: Building Off the Grid
programme.desc: A family attempts to build a 400-square foot cabin situated on a small island in Northern Idaho. Access to the property is limited and rough waters make it difficult to bring materials in. It's a race to the finish as winter hits the island early.

programme.desc: At Animal House, Dee sees a Chihuahua with a life-threatening condition, a vocal Macaw that needs a beak trim and a dangerously ill newborn calf. At home, Dr. Dee and her husband Ken welcome seven fainting goats to the family.

programme.title: Dr. Dee: Alaska Vet
programme.desc: Dr. Terry operates on a dog that was viciously attacked; Dr. Dee helps a lovesick turtle and performs a pregnancy check for a rancher.

programme.title: Dr. Dee: Alaska Vet
programme.desc: Dr. Dee swaps roles as she takes her own dog to a specialist in Anchorage for eye surgery. There, she reconnects with her step-daughter to check on a barrel racing horse. Meanwhile, a remote clinic takes a turn for the worse for Dr. Terry and Nicole.

programme.title: Dr. Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet
programme.desc: As a new normal emerges, Dr. Jeff and the Planet Pethood Plus family must rally together to ensure proper care for their animals. With no time to spare, the staff must spring into action when a dog is hit by a car, and a cat suffers from a risky bleed.

programme.title: Dr. Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet
programme.desc: Dr. Jeff performs surgeries with the help of two vet students. A tribe of fainting goats are seen by Dr. Jeff and Hector, while Dr. Amy discovers why a cute and cuddly kitten is teary-eyed.

programme.title: Dr. Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet
programme.desc: Dr. Jeff and his team lend a hand at Lakota Reservation in South Dakota. Back at the clinic, Amy debates emergency surgery for a French bulldog who ate his favorite toy, while Susan finds the perfect forever home for a lovable canine called Koda.

programme.title: Dr. Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet
programme.desc: Dr. Jeff reveals the cause behind a beloved senior dog's mysterious lump. A cat called Tigger is monitored for unusual eating habits. An owner learns the perils of purchasing her pup online after it becomes sickly, and Petra shows off her guinea pigs.

programme.title: Dr. Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet
programme.desc: Dr. Jeff and Petra train new vets at a wildlife sanctuary in Mexico. While there, they spay an endangered jaguar, and help an injured osprey. At the clinic, a Great Dane comes in with wounds after battling an air conditioner.

programme.title: Secrets in the Ice
programme.desc: A frozen lake deep in the Himalayas melts once a year to expose hundreds of human bones and a centuries-old mystery of astonishing carnage, leaving experts to speculate if it was a single catastrophic event or something much more sinister.

programme.title: Secrets in the Ice
programme.desc: Three graves are discovered on the frozen beach of an uninhabited Arctic island, and the mummified corpses inside may answer a centuries-old mystery of an expedition that was literally consumed by the cannibalistic insanity of its mutinous crew.

programme.title: Secrets in the Ice
programme.desc: When strange towers of ice are found growing from in a barren, water-starved desert, experts speculate why these structures have uncanny similarities to extraterrestrial formations recently discovered on Pluto's alien landscape.

programme.title: Secrets in the Ice

programme.title: Alaskan Bush People
programme.desc: A hungry predator encroaches deeper onto North Star Ranch forcing Bird and Gabe to take stronger action. Bam must play nice with his siblings in an effort to finally break ground on his homestead. Gabe has an incredible surprise for the Wolf Pack.

programme.title: Alaskan Bush People

programme.desc: Cynthia Langrall is shot dead while out for morning jog through the Hillcrest Ranch neighborhood in Glendale, Arizona. Detectives obtain home surveillance footage, which helps to identify the murderer's vehicle, but may not lead to the actual killer.

programme.title: The Devil Speaks
programme.desc: Robin Sowders is brutally beaten in his home in Bloomington, Indiana and later dies from his injuries. When his wife turns up at the police station, the investigation turns on its head. Only a wiretap will eventually reveal the truth.

programme.title: The Devil Speaks
programme.desc: In Arlington, Texas, Michael Humphreys and Sandra Walton are brutally gunned down. Detectives don't know who the intended victim was but when they discover recordings of phone conversations with one of the victims, they get the break they need.

programme.title: The Devil Speaks
programme.desc: An elderly couple are found murdered in their home. At first it's believed to be a robbery-gone-wrong until detectives realize it may me a family member with a grudge.

programme.title: Dead of Winter
programme.desc: After Christmas shopping, 18-year-old Linda Velzy vanishes into upstate New York's frozen landscape. The primary suspect refuses to talk to detectives, so Linda's father hatches a desperate plan. But temperatures are dropping and time is running out.

programme.title: Dead of Winter
programme.desc: When a mother and her two young children mysteriously go missing, her family goes to their home only to discover it empty. Then, two local boys nearby also disappear.

programme.title: Dead of Winter
programme.desc: On a freezing Minnesota night, a ruthless shooting leaves a young police officer fighting for his life by the roadside. As his wife awaits his fate, a heart-stopping manhunt ensues. As the killers escape, officers don't know who they'll strike next.

programme.title: Dead of Winter
programme.desc: 74-year-old widow Virginia Johannessen is shot dead in her home; then, another widow is murdered on the same street. Is someone targeting widows on Felton Road? As police unravel the truth, they discover they've made a chilling mistake.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: Soon after the lifeless body of Charlie Tuttle was discovered behind a locked bedroom door, his death was ruled a suicide. Six months later however, Kenda receives an unprompted confession that propels the case in a whole new direction.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: A hostage situation puts Sgt. Joe Kenda and his team to the test, as they try to save a family without getting shot themselves.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: A woman is found in the mountains, naked and covered in blood. As Det. Joe Kenda digs into who she is and what happened to her, he uncovers a world of violence and sexual fetishes, culminating in perhaps the most intense interrogation of his career.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: When a beloved grandmother is found stabbed to death in her own home, Kenda must turn to a tight-knit community still grieving from the tragic loss. After 12 years of searching, they finally uncover the fiendish plot to exploit the helpless victim.

programme.title: My Big Fat Fabulous Life

programme.title: My Big Fat Fabulous Life

programme.title: My Big Fat Fabulous Life

programme.title: Who Do You Think You Are?
programme.desc: Actress Jean Smart uncovers the curious tale of an unconventional ancestor in colonial Massachusetts, who got her children entangled in her own thievery ring. Later, she faced execution when she was accused of witchcraft.

programme.title: Who Do You Think You Are?
programme.desc: Megan Mullally delves into a shocking pattern of dysfunction in her father's line. She discovers that her two times great-grandmother defied societal norms to fight for her family's survival, all the while struggling to hang on to her own sanity.

programme.title: Hodges Half Dozen
programme.desc: Liz and Daniel try to potty train Rowan while keeping up with the needs of the quints. Daniel's brothers surprise Liz and Rowan with a playground for their backyard. As Connell struggles to gain weight, Liz and Daniel worry he may require a risky surgery.

programme.title: Hodges Half Dozen
programme.desc: The Hodges get ready for their first Halloween with their half dozen kids, including matching costumes for the quints. Later, Liz and Daniel are shocked to learn that Nolan, Connell, Liam and Dillon have medical conditions that may require surgeries.
